channel.title: Herb farming with plant help plz
channel.description: I have been working on farming for some time, and have added every other type of farming in the game, watering, growing, harvesting etc. Everything was going amazing until I hit the herb farming. There is only one herb plant for all of the herbs, and despite any attempts, I cannot seem to make it give you the herb of the seed that you planted. would anyone be able to help me get passed this one thing in farming I cannot seem to get figured out?

item.title: Herb farming with plant help plz
item.dc:creator: @FFkingdom FFkingdom
item.description:
@FFkingdom wrote:

tehjamdude:

People have tutorials on moparscape for herb farming, go check them out under server tutorials

Did that one already. Love doing things myself so I can learn more than just a copy paste. But either they have all ended up providing the herb for each plant set to the object ID. I am certain it is just a little thing that I am missing that will make everything click into play. I should be overly excited that all patches grow their respective plants by watering, raking the patches, and chopping down trees and fruit trees at the end of the process. But I am a perfectionist…which in websites and gaming can be a bad thing lol.

From what I understand the herb plant is only giving you ONE type of herb?

If so, just add a check to make sure it gives you the appropriate herb based on the seed used.


It will give one type, until I set another herb to it, then it will provide both of them. I have devised a method in which everything should work by a maens of reading a line of codes such as:
{SeedID}
{Herb}
{Level}
{Exp};
But something just does not make it click…I will get it eventually I am sure lmfao. Could not figure out up/down stairs and ladders when I was opening everything, then it hit me like 3 weeks later when I was doing something completely different lmfao.

Read full topic
item.source: Herb farming with plant help plz
